name: MyYouYubeLibrary
tagline: This is a library for youtube web service, implementing list search. c# course final project.
body:
## Welcome to MyYouTubeLibraty
With this library you can easily create a c# project that uses youtube search list web service.
Given a valid youtube videoID, you will get information about suggested playlists from youtube including their VideoID, title and description. 

## Getting Started 
In order to use youtube API you must first register your project at Google Developers Console ([console.developers.google.com](https://console.developers.google.com)) with your Google Account, and generate an API key. 
Next step is to download this library and add a reference to it in your project. 
At the top of your page include : using MyYouTubeLibrary;  

## Creating objects
Create factory object as following:
  

IyouTubeDataService YouTubeService(String DataType,String videoID ,String APIkey)
* DataType - the only valid argument at the moment is "VideoList", that creates a proper video list search method. In the future it is possible that we add more services to this library. 
* videoID - a viseoID you would like to search. this could be found in the query string of any youtube video URL. 
example:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=06_ng5caZ78
* APIkey - you API key from Google Developer Console.

> ### Code example:
YouTubeDataServiceFactory factory = new YouTubeDataServiceFactory();
IyouTubeDataService func1 = factory.YouTubeService("VideoList", "_bdOTUocn5w", "AIzaSyAs5EBJ96dISdxrgU1y5v93lYqIx-9Zbs0");
YouTubeData data = func1.getYouTubeData("VideoList", "_bdOTUocn5w", "AIzaSyBGKoPpk2OE3Z_-cfCwF035g7ljgZe25wo");

The returned object contain a c# List and you can apply any methods on it to use the information however you like. 
Each element of the list is an object from class Item, it contain:
string videoId { get; set; }
string title { get; set; }
string description { get; set; } 

## Authors and Contributors
This library was created by Shani Almog and Viktoria Yaakovshvili. 

## Support or Contact
Feel free to contact us for support. 
[Shaniqwa Profile on GitHub](https://github.com/shaniqwa)
